name: jarvis
description: Personal AI Chief of Staff with persistent memory, document search, and expert agent management

tools.name: store_fact
tools.description: Store a fact about the user in long-term memory. Overwrites if category+key already exists.

tools.name: delete_fact
tools.description: Delete a fact from long-term memory.

tools.name: query_memory
tools.description: Search stored facts about the user. Returns matching facts ranked by relevance (recency + confidence).

tools.name: store_location
tools.description: Store a named location in memory.

tools.name: list_locations
tools.description: List all stored locations.

tools.name: checkpoint_session
tools.description: Save important session context to persistent memory before context compaction.

tools.name: get_session_health
tools.description: Return session activity metrics: tool call count, session start time, last checkpoint.

tools.name: search_documents
tools.description: Semantic search over ingested documents. Returns the most relevant chunks.

tools.name: ingest_documents
tools.description: Ingest documents from a file or directory into the knowledge base for semantic search.

tools.name: list_agents
tools.description: List all available expert agent configurations.

tools.name: get_agent
tools.description: Get full details for a specific expert agent by name.

tools.name: create_agent
tools.description: Create or update an expert agent configuration.

tools.name: get_agent_memory
tools.description: Get all memories stored by a specific agent.

tools.name: clear_agent_memory
tools.description: Delete all memories for a specific agent.

tools.name: store_shared_memory
tools.description: Store a memory in a shared namespace for cross-agent collaboration.

tools.name: get_shared_memory
tools.description: Retrieve shared memories from a namespace.

tools.name: create_decision
tools.description: Log a decision for tracking and follow-up.

tools.name: search_decisions
tools.description: Search decisions by text and/or filter by status.

tools.name: update_decision
tools.description: Update a decision's status or add notes.

tools.name: list_pending_decisions
tools.description: List all decisions with status 'pending_execution'.

tools.name: delete_decision
tools.description: Delete a decision by ID.

tools.name: create_delegation
tools.description: Create a new delegation to track a task assigned to someone.

tools.name: list_delegations
tools.description: List delegations with optional filters.

tools.name: update_delegation
tools.description: Update a delegation's status or add notes.

tools.name: check_overdue_delegations
tools.description: Return all active delegations that are past their due date.

tools.name: delete_delegation
tools.description: Delete a delegation by ID.

tools.name: create_alert_rule
tools.description: Create or update an alert rule.

tools.name: list_alert_rules
tools.description: List all alert rules.

tools.name: check_alerts
tools.description: Run alert checks: overdue delegations, stale pending decisions (>7 days), and upcoming deadlines (within 3 days).

tools.name: dismiss_alert
tools.description: Disable an alert rule so it no longer triggers.

tools.name: list_calendars
tools.description: List calendars from available providers (Apple and optionally Microsoft 365).

tools.name: get_calendar_events
tools.description: Get events in a date range across configured providers.

tools.name: create_calendar_event
tools.description: Create a new calendar event using routing policy.

tools.name: update_calendar_event
tools.description: Update an existing calendar event by UID.

tools.name: delete_calendar_event
tools.description: Delete a calendar event by UID.

tools.name: search_calendar_events
tools.description: Search events by title text. Defaults to +/- 30 days if no dates provided.

tools.name: find_my_open_slots
tools.description: Find available time slots in your calendar within a date range.

tools.name: find_group_availability
tools.description: GUIDANCE TOOL: Explains workflow for finding group meeting times.

tools.name: list_reminder_lists
tools.description: List all reminder lists available on this Mac.

tools.name: list_reminders
tools.description: Get reminders, optionally filtered by list and completion status.

tools.name: create_reminder
tools.description: Create a new reminder.

tools.name: complete_reminder
tools.description: Mark a reminder as completed.

tools.name: delete_reminder
tools.description: Delete a reminder.

tools.name: search_reminders
tools.description: Search reminders by title text.

tools.name: send_notification
tools.description: Send a macOS notification.

tools.name: list_mailboxes
tools.description: List all mailboxes across all Mail accounts with unread counts.

tools.name: get_mail_messages
tools.description: Get recent messages (headers only) from a mailbox. Returns subject, sender, date, read/flagged status.

tools.name: get_mail_message
tools.description: Get full message content by message ID, including body, to, and cc fields.

tools.name: search_mail
tools.description: Search messages by subject or sender text in a mailbox.

tools.name: mark_mail_read
tools.description: Mark a message as read or unread.

tools.name: mark_mail_flagged
tools.description: Mark a message as flagged or unflagged.

tools.name: move_mail_message
tools.description: Move a message to a different mailbox.

tools.name: reply_to_email
tools.description: Reply to an existing email within its thread. REQUIRES confirm_send=True after user explicitly confirms.

tools.name: send_email
tools.description: Compose and send an email. REQUIRES confirm_send=True after user explicitly confirms they want to send.

tools.name: get_imessages
tools.description: Get recent iMessages from Messages.app chat history.

tools.name: list_imessage_threads
tools.description: List active iMessage threads with persisted profile metadata.

tools.name: get_imessage_threads
tools.description: Alias of list_imessage_threads for compatibility with prior plans/prompts.

tools.name: get_imessage_thread_messages
tools.description: Get messages for a specific iMessage thread by chat_identifier.

tools.name: get_thread_context
tools.description: Get thread profile and recent messages for an iMessage conversation.

tools.name: search_imessages
tools.description: Search iMessages by text, sender, or chat identifier.

tools.name: send_imessage_reply
tools.description: Send an iMessage reply. REQUIRES confirm_send=true after explicit user confirmation.

tools.name: refresh_okr_data
tools.description: Parse the ISP OKR Excel spreadsheet and store a fresh snapshot.

tools.name: query_okr_status
tools.description: Query the latest OKR data. Use after refresh_okr_data has been called.

tools.name: list_webhook_events
tools.description: List webhook events with optional filters.

tools.name: get_webhook_event
tools.description: Get full details of a webhook event including its payload.

tools.name: process_webhook_event
tools.description: Mark a webhook event as processed.

tools.name: record_tool_usage
tools.description: Record a tool usage pattern for skill analysis.

tools.name: analyze_skill_patterns
tools.description: Analyze recorded tool usage patterns and generate skill suggestions.

tools.name: list_skill_suggestions
tools.description: List skill suggestions filtered by status.

tools.name: auto_create_skill
tools.description: Accept a skill suggestion and create an agent from it using AgentFactory.

tools.name: auto_execute_skills
tools.description: Auto-create agents from high-confidence pending skill suggestions.

tools.name: create_scheduled_task
tools.description: Create a new scheduled task.

tools.name: list_scheduled_tasks
tools.description: List all scheduled tasks.

tools.name: update_scheduled_task
tools.description: Update a scheduled task's configuration.

tools.name: delete_scheduled_task
tools.description: Delete a scheduled task by ID.

tools.name: run_scheduled_task
tools.description: Manually trigger a scheduled task to run now.

tools.name: get_scheduler_status
tools.description: Get a summary of all scheduled tasks with their last and next run times.

tools.name: get_proactive_suggestions
tools.description: Run the proactive suggestion engine and return prioritized suggestions.

tools.name: dismiss_suggestion
tools.description: Dismiss a proactive suggestion so it doesn't reappear.

tools.name: list_inbound_events
tools.description: List recent inbound events normalized across channels (iMessage, Mail, Webhook).

tools.name: get_event_summary
tools.description: Get a count of recent inbound events by channel.

tools.name: link_identity
tools.description: Link a provider identity to a canonical person name.

tools.name: unlink_identity
tools.description: Remove an identity link for a specific provider account.

tools.name: get_identity
tools.description: Get all linked accounts for a person by their canonical name.

tools.name: search_identity
tools.description: Search identities by name, email, or provider ID.

tools.name: create_event_rule
tools.description: Create an event rule that triggers an agent when a matching webhook event arrives.

tools.name: update_event_rule
tools.description: Update an existing event rule.

tools.name: delete_event_rule
tools.description: Delete an event rule by ID.

tools.name: list_event_rules
tools.description: List event rules.

tools.name: process_webhook_event_with_agents
tools.description: Manually trigger agent dispatch for a specific webhook event.

tools.name: get_session_status
tools.description: Return current session status: token estimate, interaction count, time since last checkpoint.

tools.name: flush_session_memory
tools.description: Persist structured session data to long-term memory.

tools.name: restore_session
tools.description: Restore context from a previous session checkpoint.

tools.name: enrich_person
tools.description: Get a consolidated profile for a person: identities, facts, delegations, decisions, recent messages, and emails.

tools.name: open_teams_browser
tools.description: Launch a persistent Chromium browser and navigate to Teams.

tools.name: post_teams_message
tools.description: Prepare a message for posting to a Teams channel or person.

tools.name: confirm_teams_post
tools.description: Send the previously prepared Teams message.

tools.name: cancel_teams_post
tools.description: Cancel the previously prepared Teams message.

tools.name: close_teams_browser
tools.description: Close the persistent Teams browser.

tools.name: get_session_brain
tools.description: Get the current Session Brain -- persistent cross-session context.

tools.name: update_session_brain
tools.description: Update the Session Brain with new information.

tools.name: route_message
tools.description: Determine the safety tier and delivery channel for an outbound message.

tools.name: list_playbooks
tools.description: List all available team playbooks.

tools.name: get_playbook
tools.description: Get details of a specific playbook including its workstreams and inputs.
